articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says he's been provoked into a more intense rivalry with Arsenal as the fallout continues from their Premier League clash at Etihad Stadium last weekend.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Man City boss says he's been provoked into bigger Arsenal rivalry

articles.description: England show their firepower with bat and ball as they level the one-day international series with a 186-run thrashing of Australia at Lord's.
articles.title: England vs Australia: Harry Brook leads hosts to thumping series-levelling win

articles.description: Swiss cyclist Muriel Furrer dies after suffering a serious head injury at the Road and Para-cycling World Championships in Switzerland.
articles.title: Muriel Furrer: Swiss cyclist dies after crash at Road and Para-cycling World Championships

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Crystal Palace vs Chelsea in the Women's Super League.
articles.title: Crystal Palace vs Chelsea LIVE: WSL score, text & latest updates

articles.description: The All England Club's plans to expand the Wimbledon site is approved, despite fierce local opposition to the scheme.
articles.title: Wimbledon expansion: Controversial plans for 39 new courts approved by Greater London Authority

articles.description: Liverpool keeper Alisson Becker talks to BBC Football Focus about what keeps him motivated and what life is like under new manager Arne Slot.
articles.title: Alisson Becker: Liverpool keeper talks motivation and says 'best is still to come'

articles.description: Manchester City midfielder Rodri will miss the rest of the season because of an anterior cruciate ligament injury.
articles.title: Rodri: Manchester City midfielder ruled out for season after ACL surgery

articles.description: Canada great Christine Sinclair, the all-time top scorer in international football, will retire in November at the end of the 2024 National Women's Soccer League season.
articles.title: Christine Sinclair: Record international goalscorer to retire in November

articles.description: A return to football for Wojciech Szczesny, Barcelona and Real Madrid approach records in La Liga and the top two meet in Germany - what to look out for in Europe.
articles.title: Szczesny comeback, La Liga records & Bayern's Leverkusen test

articles.description: Charlie Edwards continues his charge towards a world-title shot at bantamweight by beating Thomas Essomba to become European champion.
articles.title: Boxing: Charlie Edwards takes step towards become two-weight world champion
